EmailTemplate.name: Trial Copy Test (Experienced): May 2016.Day 10 - Email 7: Shipping
EmailTemplate.subject: Shipping made easy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save money with BigCommerce shipping rates. Call 1-844-632-8912 for assistance on selecting a BigCommerce plan today. Log in to your control panel <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Ship smarter
...save money SET UP SHIPPING <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/deep-links/shipping]]> Better shipping = happier customers
BigCommerce offers powerful shipping options that let you streamline your fulfillment process and get orders to your customers faster.
Our intuitive shipping manager makes it easy to:
- Set up all the locations to which you’ll be selling
- Offer real-time carrier quotes, flat-rate shipping, free shipping, or weight- or value-based rates
- Seamlessly integrate solutions for printing shipping labels, dropshipping or shipping automation
Set up your shipping and start saving » <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/deep-links/shipping]]>
